summary: With "Gentleman's Agreement" as his jumping off point, Jamie Kastner asks who's a Jew, and does it matter. He'll answer the question, "Are you Jewish?" with a yes to see how people react. ... See full summary »
cast: Jamie Kastner|Pat Buchanan|Avraham B. Yehoshua|Carol Gould|Richard Ingrams|Michael Sebban|Jalda Rebling|Leia Rush
title: Kike Like Me
